description.jp:
幼馴染のレムと共に０組に編入した
アギト候補生。兄の戦死をきっかけに
「死」という概念を極端に恐れるように
なり 愛する者を救うための強大な力を
渇望し続けている。素直で純粋な性格
のせいか ときに周囲の声に翻弄され
自分を見失ってしまう一面もある。
description.gl: Rem's childhood friend and an Agito cadet in Class 0. Developing an extreme fear of death after the loss of his brother to war、 he lusts for power that would allow him to protect those he loves. Perhaps due to his pure and honest nature、 he sometimes loses himself to the voices of those around him.

jp.text: アンタに何がわかるッ！
こんな仕事は……\nオレひとりで十分だ
弱いのはいやだ……\n守られるだけの存在なのはいやだ
オレは欲しい \n仲間を守ることができる圧倒的な力が……！
大切な人が居るって いいことじゃんか
レムは絶対に失わない 守り抜く！\n何をしてでも！

gl.text: What the hell do YOU know?
There's no need to involve her...
I hate being weak. I hate being a person who needs protection.
More than anything、 I want...the skills to protect others!
There's nothing wrong with a widdle boy who wuvs his mommy.
I will never lose Rem! I will protect her—no matter what!

desc.en:
8-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Moderately raises BRV damage dealt when attacking single target
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 200% Max BRV
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Raises BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt
Inflicts [Spiral's Lynchpin] to target for 2 turns
Grants [Piercing Power] for 8 turns
No Action Delay
Does not consume ability uses on next turn (excl. LD Ability)

While attacking target afflicted with [Spiral's Lynchpin], triggers the following attack:
• 4-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
• Moderately raises BRV damage dealt when attacking single target
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
• Raises BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt
* Does not trigger upon countering or chase sequence attack
desc.gl:
8-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Increases BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt
All targets: 2 turns Spiral's Lynchpin
Self: 8 turns Piercing Power
Instant turn rate
Next turn after use does not consume ability use count (some abilities excluded)

When attacking target afflicted with Spiral's Lynchpin debuff (counter, chain attack excluded):
 • 4-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
 • Increases BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt

与えるHPダメージは分配
与えたHPダメージの30％分 自身のBRVをアップさせる

desc.en:
「Awakening」 use +1

When using 「Awakening」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2
- Moderately raises total BRV potency
- Slightly improves the Max BRV and Attack increase of 「Awakening」 buff
- Triggers an HP attack after use

When using 「Furious Blades」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 4
- Moderately raises total BRV potency

While 「Awakening」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Greatly raises total BRV potency
　∟ Low Action Delay

When breaking target or attacking a broken target using 「Awakening」, 「Furious Blades」 or 「BRV Attack+」:
- Turns 「Furious Blades」 into 「Furious Blades+」
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Doesn't increase turn count
　∟ Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
desc.gl:
Awakening use +1

When using Awakening:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slight boost to raised MAX BRV, ATK from Awakening buff
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

When using Furious Blades:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage

While Awakening active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; higher turn rate)

When using Awakening, Furious Blades, BRV Attack+:
